title: Internet Conection
body:
Hello, lately i've been getting alot of internet errors in the client of the game witch it has prevented me from locking in the champion or even banning champs... i lost alot of LP from this and i also got a 30mins ban witch it wasnt my fault cause i never leave games and quit when in champ select... The only thing is that when i open "the client" my internet stops working properly. Also i have tested this connection and it seems that "LOL" is the only game that gives me this type of errors/failurs any help is appreciated. thanks for your time! 
{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}

replies.body:
Since League seems to be the only thing that isn't connecting successfully, it might be caused by either firewalls/antivirus blocking that connection to our servers or it could be network settings related. Let's take a few minutes to step back and troubleshoot this problem before hopping into more matchmade games that could get you longer LPQ's from this.

Go through the steps outlined in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as well as disabling any firewalls/antivirus while League is running. Test those in a custom/practice match and let me know how it helps.
